page.title: 04American Visit to Nuthurst
page.content: On Friday 7th June 38 Americans came to Nuthurst to stay with families in the parish. They came from the University Christian Church,{Fort {Worth, Texas. It all started in 1981 when our church organ started to fail playing properly and then the idea came up. On the first night they went to a reception. On the first day they didn't go on any outing because they were on the plane all the time,and on the 2nd day they went to one place. On normal days they went to two or three places.On the Friday they had a farewell barbecue and barn dance.On the second Saturday they went to the school's sheep dog trial then they left to go to the Tower Hotel,{London, where they stayed 6 days. On one day they visited our School. All this was to raise money for the{Building Fund.
